original_text: But if only a little water comes near to it, it will start to grow again. It will make new branches, like a young plant. But if only a little water comes near to it,
korean_text: 물 기운에 움이 돋고 가지가 뻗어서 새로 심은 것과 같거니와

sentences.original_text: But if only a little water comes near to it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 조금의 물만 그것에 가까이 오면

sentences.original_text: it will start to grow again
But if only a little water comes near to it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 조금의 물만 그것에 가까이 오면
